job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

jd: From: Arjun Kumar, Infotech Spectrum, Inc arjun@infotechspectrum.com Reply to: arjun@infotechspectrum.com Position: Java Backend Developer Location: Atlanta, GA (on-site - Hybrid) Job Type: 12 Months Contract Industry: Telecommunications We are seeking a Java Backend Developer with expertise in ServiceNow and IT Service Management (ITSM) to enhance and maintain our telecom service delivery platform. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in Java development and a strong understanding of ITSM processes and tools, particularly within the context of ServiceNow. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. 8+ years of experience in Java backend development. Strong knowledge of ServiceNow, including configuration, scripting, and application development. Familiarity with ITIL processes and frameworks, particularly in Incident, Problem, and Change Management. Experience with RESTful API development and microservices architecture. Proficiency in databases (SQL/NoSQL) and ORM tools. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Strong communication and collaboration abilities. Experience with cloud technologies (AWS, Azure, GCP) related to ITSM solutions. Knowledge of Agile/Scrum methodologies and practices. Familiarity with telecommunications standards and protocols.
